div.div: Saint John's Univ. vs. Buena Vista Univ.
at Storm Lake, Iowa | J. Leslie Rollins

tr.td: Tyler Stolen kickoff 62 yards to the SJU03, Evan Clark return 46 yards to the SJU49 (Trace Ticknor).
Saint John's Univ. drive start at 15:00.
Zack Sundly rush for 8 yards to the BVU43 (Z. Mueggenberg).
Adam Essler rush for 28 yards to the BVU15 (Griffin Reding; Nick Novotny).
